title: All my Loot is Gone...
body: My entire loot dissipated after earning another 10 tokens from completing a mission... I see that other people's loot is crashing but mine is completely empty.

replies.body: i have the same bug and i have no missions

Hi!

Loot was crashing for people, and missing inventory may have been a symptom of this issue. The bug where loot was crashing has been solved. If you're still not seeing loot (should only be visual, so no worries!) lemme know! :)
